name: Hospital
description: Chinese Hospital is a non-profit community hospital that offers medical, surgical, and specialty care to a multicultural community. It is a 88-bed, acute care facility.
fullDescription: Chinese Hospital is a non-profit community hospital that offers medical, surgical, and specialty care to a multicultural community. It is a 88-bed, acute care facility.
whatTheyOffer: Chinese Hospital is a non-profit community hospital that offers medical, surgical, and specialty care to a multicultural community. It is a 88-bed, acute care facility.
howToGetIt: For Chinese Hospital general inquiries or information, please call the main line 1-415-982-2400. To speak with specific departments or locations, please call the appropriate extensions from the list below. https://www.chinesehospital-sf.org/contact-us
